status.description:
*1 - success
 *2 - warning
 *3 - validation error
 *4 - critical notice
 *5 - other

200.description: Returns options for invoice edit page like dropdowns and disabled/mandatory fields

get.description: Produces set of filtered and paginated invoices data. Default page=1, per_page=20. Can be sent in POST query, in this case params should be in JSON body.

parameters.name: expense_domain
parameters.description:
* 0: T&E
* 1: AP
* 2: AP Audit
* 3: Inter-company
* 4: Conferences

parameters.name: origin_invoice_status
parameters.description:
* 1: No Need Origin Invoice
* 2: Need Origin Invoice
* 3: Need to Reissue By Client
* 4: Need To Reissue
* 5: Reissued By Client
* 6: Reissued By VATBox
* 7: Origin Invoice Accepted
* 8: Origin invoice replied to VATBox
* 9: Origin invoice replied to client

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
* 0: Deleted
* 1: Uploaded
* 2: Assigned To Agent
* 3: Need More Info
* 4: Ready To Reclaim
* 5: Rejected By VATBox
* 6: Reclaimed
* 7: In Discussion With Authorities
* 8: Approved
* 9: Refunded
* 10: Canceled
* 11: Rejected By Authorities
* 12: Ready To Remainder Reclaim
* 13: Associated To Reclaim
* 14: Scanned
* 15: Auto-filled
* 16: Input Validated
* 17: Submission Failed
* 19: Awaiting Scan
* 20: Suspected Duplicate
* 22: Merged
* 23: Missing Details
* 24: Crowds-filled
* 25: Need To Reissue
* 26: Replay

parameters.name: directive
parameters.description:
* 1: Directive 8
* 2: Domestic
* 3: Requires registration
* 4: Directive 13
* 5: None
* 6: VAT registration

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: String to search for - searches by invoice_number, invoice_amount, reclaim_amount, employee_name, id

post.description: Same as GET request but allows to put more parameters without URL limitations. Takes params as json in body (requires Content-Type=application/json)

get.summary: Returns options for certain selector (or all of them)
get.description:
Returns data for filter options. Use param 'group' to specify which set of options should be used. Can be an array - so you can ask for `group=['status', 'reject_reason']`
Companies and agents can be paginated.

get.summary: Searches for supplier by term and country
get.description: Suppliers are being searched by term, because returning a full list is not possible.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Optional restriction to search for supplier in selected country/coutries (can be an array)

parameters.name: filtered_ids
parameters.description: List of companies to exclude from result

parameters.name: filtered_ids
parameters.description: List of companies to exclude from result

post.summary: Starts export of invoices in required format
post.description: Same as GET/POST /gate/v1/invoices_data - takes all the same parameters as index.

400.description: if format is blank of not supported or number of invoices matching filter exceeds limit (currently 200'000)

error.description: Message that should be shown to user

notice.description: Message that should be shown to user

application/json.notice: Your export is being processed and you will be notified by email when it is completed.
